barker_notes.barker_summary: James Gaines to Austin, August 13, 1825. Slave stealing. Outlaws or the eastern frontier. Organization to suppress them.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Gaines to Austin, August 13, 1825. Slave stealing. Outlaws or the eastern frontier. Organization to suppress them.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Department of Texas Sabine*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-13-1825">Aug 13. 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Steven F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr. Sir your favr by *person_mentioned*Mr. G D Collier */person_mentioned*came to hand but not by him, when he arive at the *location_mentioned*naches */location_mentioned*he found *person_mentioned*Robt Collier*/person_mentioned* were in the pursuit of him and offered a Reward of a *person_mentioned*negro */person_mentioned*for his scalp [He had ?] sent an *person_mentioned*Indian */person_mentioned*and a set of *person_mentioned*cut throats*/person_mentioned*, on the *location_mentioned*Lower Rout*/location_mentioned* after him, he then Turnd his course *location_mentioned*up through the *person_mentioned*Cherokees*/person_mentioned* */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*passd above and fell in at cantoonment*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Jessup */person_mentioned*it is said he applied to *person_mentioned*Col. Maurice*/person_mentioned* (?) for protection and it was Refusd he passd on safe but Did not apply here for the ballance *person_mentioned*Robt Collier*/person_mentioned* has threatened my Life because I Did not Let him know *person_mentioned*G D Collier*/person_mentioned* was Going to the *location_mentioned*Brassos */location_mentioned*for them *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned*, and has Ever since He has (?) *person_mentioned*OQuin*/person_mentioned* which you ordered from the *location_mentioned*Brassos */location_mentioned*and a number Like him about him to stand against the *person_mentioned*authority*/person_mentioned*, on the *date_mentioned n="08-11-1825">11th of Inst.*/date_mentioned* I calld a meeting of the people to Establish ways and means for keeping peace, they met nearly unanimously, which amounted to upwards of 40 and formd and assignd the following Resolutions*/p*
*p*first to support the Federal and State Constitutions*/p*
*p*secondly to obey the Laws of *person_mentioned*General Government*/person_mentioned* as well as that of the *person_mentioned*State */person_mentioned*and aid the *person_mentioned*mexican authorities*/person_mentioned* to Enforce the same*/p*
*p*thirdly [Not to] suffer to Reside nor harbour or be harboured in said District *person_mentioned*Criminals */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Vagrants */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Rogues */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*Disorderly Characters*/person_mentioned* under the penalty of forfeiting all Right of Ever becoming a *person_mentioned*Mexican Citizen*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I then organized them into a *person_mentioned*Company of militia*/person_mentioned* Elected*person_mentioned* militia officers*/person_mentioned* to Enforce the same*/p*
*p*while we were ingaged in this *person_mentioned*George W Collier*/person_mentioned* had come out of curiosity to se our force*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Captn A. B. Gill*/person_mentioned* arive here from *location_mentioned*Rapide */location_mentioned*and made oath that *person_mentioned*James Collier*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*George Colliers*/person_mentioned* (*person_mentioned*Brothers of R Collier */person_mentioned*had had in their possession *person_mentioned*three negro men*/person_mentioned* which had been stolen from him, *person_mentioned*G W Collier*/person_mentioned* was immediately Taken and confessed Voluntarily that they had them at *location_mentioned*yocanis East [of] the Sabine*/location_mentioned* and that they should be given up as well as others from *location_mentioned*Rapide */location_mentioned*(in my absence those *person_mentioned*negroes */person_mentioned*were harbourd at *person_mentioned*R Colliers */person_mentioned*by *person_mentioned*James and G. W. Collier*/person_mentioned*)*/p*
*p*they Left here with *person_mentioned*Collier */person_mentioned*under a strong *person_mentioned*Guard */person_mentioned*for *person_mentioned*yocanis */person_mentioned*in pursuit of the *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I am this moment, informd they found no *person_mentioned*negroes */person_mentioned*that they are hid and that the *person_mentioned*Guard */person_mentioned*Caught another *person_mentioned*Rogue */person_mentioned*by the name of *person_mentioned*Steven Jackson*/person_mentioned* and this morning whipt him and *person_mentioned*Collier */person_mentioned*until they told where the *person_mentioned*negroes */person_mentioned*were, and that the *person_mentioned*Guard */person_mentioned*was again in pursuit, So much for *person_mentioned*Alabama Rogues*/person_mentioned*, our meeting has Raised their ambition on *location_mentioned*the other side of Sabine*/location_mentioned* and they have Commenced Runing *person_mentioned*Rogues*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The inclosed will inform you of one *person_mentioned*stolen negro */person_mentioned*which has *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1825">this spring*/date_mentioned* arive on the *location_mentioned*Brassos */location_mentioned*which I will be Responsible for all Costs and Damages If I Do not have the Charges substanciated I will inform you from time to Time until I again Conquer the *person_mentioned*Rogues*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jas Gaines */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
